alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 11:52AM EDT until March 31 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River at US 19 near Carsonville affecting Talbot, Taylor, Crawford and Upson Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Carsonville...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River at US 19 near Carsonville. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 22.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.1 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 18 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
